name: Hot Potato! (lopmon, atrus159, Skylar)
description:
One Click. One Second. One Potato

Hot Potato is a lightning-Fast puzzle/bouncing game where you have one second to decide where to shoot the potato. Gotta go Fast! Play through a whole group of levels at once to unlock the next group, or practice until you are ready.

controls:
click or space to shoot
r to restart the level

This is the game we made for GMTK Game Jam 2019 under 48 hours.

Credit: 

Our Lord and Savior, the Unstoppable, the Father of Programming - Darius Rudominer

Some programming and some level design, a shitty music - Shisong Liu

Beautiful graphics, nice doggo and all the animation, and memes - Mohan Jia
